title: Sari (India), late 19th–early 20th century
description: Light reddish-brown sari with a wide border at each end and a narrow border on each side in silk and metallic thread. The end borders are patterned by ten flowering bushes or "butah" on a gold background. Two narrow floral vine borders with a gold background at top and bottom. Colors are dark blue, medium blue, red, pink, orange, and green.

tombstone.epitaph: Sari (India), late 19th–early 20th century; cotton, silk, metallic thread; H x W: 326 x 167 cm (10 ft. 8 3/8 in. x 5 ft. 5 3/4 in.); 1969-62-2
